title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a REST & CLI API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama local models for use in chains, agents, RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting, managing models, multi-user, RAG uploads; runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; synchronous & async APIs, model management, streaming chat.

title: ollamac
summary: Native macOS SwiftUI app that wraps Ollama for a ChatGPT-like desktop experience.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (Rust) for interactive chat, model browsing and logs; works over SSH.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma; ingest PDFs and query locally.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot calls to a local Ollama model for private autocomplete.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image (cuda & cpu) and compose examples for running Ollama containerised.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack 2.0 pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library for C# with full Ollama API coverage, streaming chat, model management and DI helpers.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate providing typed wrappers for every Ollama endpoint plus embedding helpers.

title: ollama-camunda
summary: Community Camunda 8 connector that delegates service tasks to local Ollama models for private BPMN AI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot (Node) that answers DMs and mentions using a configurable Ollama model.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All chat UI now supports Ollama backends; switch between llama.cpp & Ollama in settings.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for announcements, troubleshooting and showcase of community Ollama projects.
